improvementsOptional.description: This uses three contracts. The modified contract from the previous task, a custom cw721 contract that can mint pokemon-like cosmon creature nfts. And the Main contract: an NFT-Marketplace. The marketplace allows to offer any cw721 token for any amount of any cw20 token. Txs in order are: mint cosmon (contractaddr: regen:1xswqut08fuyqu0vap87wfj63gwku0z2jc644y5), offer cosmon with send to marketplace and finally buying the cosmon with the cw20 tokens through a send tx from previous cw20 contract to marketplace.
